org.xbib.pipeline

Class AbstractPipeline<R extends PipelineRequest,E extends PipelineException>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.pipeline.AbstractPipeline<R,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the pipeline request type
    E - the pipeline error type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Callable<MeterMetric>, Iterator<R>, Pipeline<MeterMetric,R>, PipelineErrorListener<MeterMetric,R,E>, PipelineRequestListener<MeterMetric,R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFeeder

    public abstract class AbstractPipeline<R extends PipelineRequest,E extends PipelineException>
extends Object
implements Pipeline<MeterMetric,R>, PipelineRequestListener<MeterMetric,R>, PipelineErrorListener<MeterMetric,R,E>
    Basic pipeline for pressing pipeline requests. This abstract class can be used for creating custom Pipeline classes.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public Pipeline<MeterMetric,R> add(String name,
                          PipelineRequestListener<MeterMetric,R> listener)
        Add a pipeline request listener to the pipeline. The listener is called each time this pipeline processes a new request.
        Parameters:
        name - the listener name
        listener - the listener
        Returns:
        this pipeline

      • call

        public MeterMetric call()
                 throws Exception
        Call this thread. Iterate over all request and pass them to request listeners. At least, this pipeline itself can listen to requests and handle errors. Only PipelineExceptions are handled for each listener. Other execptions will quit the pipeline request executions.
        Specified by:
        call in interface Callable<MeterMetric>
        Returns:
        a metric about the pipeline request executions.
        Throws:
        Exception - if pipeline execution was sborted by a non-PipelineException

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Removing pipeline requests is not supported.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Iterator<R extends PipelineRequest>

        Return the metric.
        Specified by:
